sense.name: office divider
sense.commentary: partition divider - a vertical structure that divides or separates
sense.examples: Suzy tripped and knocked over all the partitions like dominoes. George had to stand on his desk to see over the partition.

sense.name: dividing
sense.commentary: PARTITION[+event] division, partition, partitioning, segmentation, sectionalization, sectionalisation - the act of dividing or partitioning; separation by the creation of a boundary that divides or keeps apart
sense.examples: The partition of the office was done over the weekend. The partition of the bedroom kept the roommates from fighting.

sense.name: piece of hard disk
sense.commentary: the part of a hard disk that is dedicated to a particular operating system or application and accessed as a single unit
sense.examples: The other partition has the file you're looking for.
